Articles.Content:
Does anyone remember way back when Novaskilso was still with SQUAD, and he was discussing adding some new planets to the game?

Well, i'd like to Request that those planets be made.

HADREA: (just a made up name from me, as i don't think the planet was ever given a name)

A blue, ringed gas giant that is 9000 kilometers in diameter, and orbits kerbol a little farther away than jool.

Daphy:

A small moon of Hadrea that slightly resembles minmus, but spins so fast that it is stretched into an oblong spheroid. It orbits Hadrea in a highly eccentric orbit.

Fonso:

- - - Updated - - -

durrrrrrrrrr.....

idk why this was posted.
